sect4.title: Special treatment of sc_types.h
sect4.para: When generating C or C++ source code, the header file sc_types.h undergoes a special treatment. This file is generated only once and will never be overwritten when the C code generator is executed again. This way any manual adoptions to sc_types.h are preserved.

warning.para: Please note that this feature is present for historical reasons only. It is quite likely that it will be removed in the future. Please use the libraryTargetFolder parameter of the Outlet generator feature for a better and general solution, see !
